Name: Obsidian Barrier
Desc:
[Enchant Force]
Protects yourself and your party members by amplifying the power of the Relic.
Party member with the power of protection deals increased Critical Damage against enemies with the Ancient Curse Debuff.
The attacks from Obsidian Barrier won't harm you even if the enemy has a counterattack buff.
Enhanced Discharge
Provides individual shields to nearby party members.
Enhanced Blast
The size of the shield becomes larger.
Enhanced Transition
You can reinstall the shield.
